/usr/bin/g++    -rdynamic -O3 -fPIC -ggdb -std=c++11 -Wall -Wno-deprecated -Werror -Wno-unused-function -Wno-builtin-macro-redefined -Wno-deprecated-declarations -g   CMakeFiles/test_thread.dir/tests/test_thread.cc.o  -o /home/xu/Server_SYLAR/sylar/bin/test_thread -rdynamic /home/xu/Server_SYLAR/sylar/lib/libsylar.so -L/Server_SYLAR/sylar/lib -lyaml-cpp -lpthread -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/xu/Server_SYLAR/sylar/lib
